welcome_message_body: Welcome to Changping, China! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich history, beautiful scenery, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Changping has to offer.

restaurants.name: 玉膳府
restaurants.description: 玉膳府 is a beijing restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: 金肆维玉麒麟餐馆
restaurants.description: 金肆维玉麒麟餐馆 is a asian restaurant located in 北京市.

restaurants.name: 唐人府酒店
restaurants.description: 唐人府酒店 is a asian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi service is available throughout the airport.
